entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 1:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:58 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:58 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:58 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
